response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence in mind. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to quality and functionality. Given its exceptional features and the care put into its creation, we believe it's worth more than $150. However, to make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you for $180. This price reflects its true value and the benefits it will bring to you. Please let me know if you're interested in making this investment in something truly special.", "product_price": 180}
